name: aero-overload
description: ECMAScript function/method overloading with support of several approaches: decorator, fluent builder, neat factory
author: Denis Vlassenko <denis_vlassenko@epam.com>

scripts.all: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test && npm run cover && npm run doc
scripts.build: npm run make:lib && npm run make:spc && npm run minify
scripts.cover: rimraf coverage && babel-node node_modules/isparta/bin/isparta cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- aero-overload.specs.js --reporter dot
scripts.doc: npm run doc:library && npm run doc:tests
scripts.doc:lib: jsdoc2md aero-overload.js > documentation/readme.md --global-index-format dl --member-index-format grouped --module-index-format dl --param-list-format list --property-list-format list --sort-by name
scripts.doc:spc: mocha aero-overload.specs.js --compilers babel:babel-core/register --reporter markdown --require core-js > specifications/readme.md
scripts.lint: npm run lint:lib && npm run lint:spc
